otpModal.aSecureOne: A secure one time password (OTP) will be sent to your registered mobile number.
otpModal.pleaseEnter: Please enter this OTP to continue.

preApproval.title: 1. Pre-approval
preApproval.description: Find out your loan eligibility in under 10 minutes.
preApproval.subDescription: Please keep your Emirates ID and Passport details handy to complete your application process.
preApproval.inProgressDescription: Thank you! Your application has been submitted and is under process. You can check back for updates. Once it’s ready, we’ll email it to your registered address.
preApproval.congratulations: Congratulations! You’re one step closer to your dream home. Use this document to plan, search and shortlist eligible properties within your eligibility.

propertyValuation.title: 2. Property Valuation
propertyValuation.description: Our independent third-party review will help determine your property's true value, ensuring a fair price and providing you peace of mind.

finalOffer.title: 3. Final Offer Letter
finalOffer.description: Watch this space for another exciting digital journey that will soon be revealed to you.

guide.title: Dream Home Buying Guide
guide.description: Our guidebook is designed to help you navigate every step of your home-buying journey.

deals.title: Deals and Discount
deals.description: Discover home deals and discounts, curated to support you on your dream home journey.

legal.title: Just Wills
legal.description: 50% discount on will drafting services at JW Legal Consultants

loanDetails.title: Loan Details
loanDetails.description: You can now choose from one of our flexible pricing options to suit your individual needs. Your monthly instalment and the eligible finance amount will be determined based on the pricing option you choose. Default rate will be applied to your Pre-Approval eligibility calculation if a choice is not made at this step.
loanDetails.specialPricing: Based on your profile, you may be considered for special pricing on your Pre-approval letter.

threeYear.title: 3 Year applicable fixed interest / Ijarah rate p.a. for first 3 years
threeYear.description: followed by 3 month Eibor plus applicable margins thereafter. Hybrid pricing structure.

fiveYear.title: 5 Year applicable fixed interest / Ijarah rate p.a. for first 5 years
fiveYear.description: followed by 3 month Eibor plus applicable margins thereafter. Hybrid pricing structure.

variable.title: Variable 1 month EIBOR
variable.description: plus applicable interest / Ijarah rate. Variable pricing structure.

loanDetails.note: Note: Rates may change at the time of your application.

employmentType.invalid: Please select a valid employment type

joiningDate.format: Date must be in DD/MM/YYYY format

fixedMonthlyIncome.helperText: Basic salary and/or housing rent allowance

errors.accept: You must accept the terms and conditions

payment.title: Payment Details
payment.description: Congratulations! You've reached the final step of your valuation process. Please proceed to pay your valuation fee to complete your application.
payment.discountApplied: Discount has been successfully applied to your order
